channel.title: jupyter on Dai, Yutong / 戴宇童
channel.description: Recent content in jupyter on Dai, Yutong / 戴宇童

item.title: Using the right kernel for Jupyter Notebook
item.description: # create virtual env with python 3.7.7, whose name is cuppy conda create -n cuppy numpy scipy pandas notebook matplotlib python=3.7.7 # activate cuppy conda activate cuppy # I am using zsh, you may change to bash conda init zsh # activate virtual env cond activate cuppy # point this verison of Python to jupyter ipython kernel install --name "cuppy" --user
